Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hostal aguilar periods june july 2012 gloomy painted sad shade orange moreover ac wasnt effective heat june occasions nicer spacious bath ac unlike third bed suite spacious staff friendly helpful location half kilometre plaza sol prado lot choices eating cost lower paid equivalent accomodation rome barcelona florence building reception shape location wi fi free fast help

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!!”
Reviews.Author: Buddhakkan
Reviews.Content: booked hotel lot anticipation disappointed low expectations hotel located middle tourist attractions – sol museum plaza mayor palace – walking distance 2the reception staffed 24 hours speak english helpful decent size beds lots space luggage move 4we arrived 8 am ready check immediately 5the clean serviced everyday bathrooms basic toiletries vending machine lobby drinks normal prices rarity tourist madrid free airconditioning rare 3 hotels spain internet broadband strong signal allowed log device time safe security monitored nice bathroom issue ants swarming 2the tv miniscule don’t remember seeing english channels internet logged youtube etc verdict five star star don’t claim provide safe clean convenient board happy aguilar didn’t burn hole pockets met return madrid definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “perfect for low cost travel”
Reviews.Author: eyequeen
Reviews.Content: hostal aguilar situated center madrid sol prado meter ministry buildings cafés cheap basic comforts clean sheets towels breakfast cafés easy walking distance offer breakfast café croissant orange juice spanish chocolate con try stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great location, great price”
Reviews.Author: TartanBadger
Reviews.Content: fiancee stayed weekend madrid loved size bed 1 bed comfy bathroom fullsized tub extremely rare lowerpriced hotels inexpensive minor downsides doors sounds carry hallway overlooked interior courtyard theres restaurant ground level little noisy midnight

Reviews.Title: “Great Basic Hotel, Wonderful Location”
Reviews.Author: simone65l
Reviews.Content: hostal aguilar exceeded expectations basic economy hotel reception exremely helpful accommodating single ensuite clean comfortable location minutes walk prado park heart city truly wonderful surprise blocks metro makes hopping section dont walk extremely easy stay minute recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location + All is ok”
Reviews.Author: cgiderler
Reviews.Content: hostel center madrid 3 minutes walk del sol stuff friendly talk english clean quiet name hostel bigger confortable 3 stars tv safebox internet pc reasonable price drinks snack lobby
